## PlayerCamera.setViewModelShownNodes() method

Shows nodes on the view model (or attached entity's model if no view model is set), overriding hidden nodes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setViewModelShownNodes(viewModelShownNodes: string[]): void;
```

</th><th>

</td><td>

</td><td>

Node name substrings to show.

\*\*Category:\*\* Players


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Only affects this camera's player. Uses case-insensitive substring matching. Replaces the current set (not a merge).
